body.name: Geniospin Queen Comforter Set, Boho Aztec Comforter Set 8 Pieces, All Season Reversible Bed in A Bag, Soft Microfiber Fill Bedding, Lightweight, Warm and Breathable (Brown, 90"x90")
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 23 mins
features: Material: This queen comforter set features a year-round microfiber fabric construction for comfortable use. The hypoallergenic filling in the comforter, being made of ultra fine fibers, provides exceptional warmth and coziness.

Boho Design: Unique reversible boho Aztec comforter. Designed in classic brown, which has A side in bright tone and B side in dark tone, coming with matching shams, sheets and a decor pillow. This bedding set would bring you great fun mix and match.

Components & Size: Complete bed in a bag with great deal! Our queen size boho comforter set includes 8 piece(inch): 1 boho comforter 90x90, 1 flat sheet 90x102, 1 fitted sheet 60x80+14, 1 decor pillow 12x16, 2 shams 20x26, 2 pillow cases 20x30.

Delicate workmanship: This queen comforter is crafted by fine workmanship. Firm quilting, no shifting after washing, soft and breathable. Since the comforter is packaged in a vacuum bag, it is highly recommended to expose it in the sun and tap gently for fluffy.

Care & Services: Machine wash cold separately, gentle cycle, tumble dry low, do not bleach or iron. We provide bedding comforter sets free return and exchange service, don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions, please rest assured to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Affordable & comfortable
reviews.reviewText: 10/10. I love this set. Nice quality, comfortable, and cute design! Very affordable and feels/looks expensive! I’ll be buying this brand again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Love this set! Its pretty, soft and good quality. Love that the fitted sheets have pockets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Geniospin King Size Comforter Set, and it's been a great addition to my bedroom. The reversible Boho design with the spliced Aztec pattern in yellow adds a vibrant touch. The 8-piece set provides everything needed for a cohesive look, and the generous size of 102x90 inches ensures ample coverage. The down alternative filling offers comfort without feathers. The only minor downside is that the sheets could be softer, but overall, it's a stylish and well-rounded bedding set for those who appreciate Boho aesthetics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay For Price
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: 07.04.2023I have my review a 4th star. I have not been able to get back in until now, but immediately (probably within a couple hours) of my review, the seller reach out offering to make things right with my order. I didn't take him up on it as I am quite satisfied with the comforter alone. However, it's nice to still find a business who still backs the quality of their products. He very well could have taken my review as another "opinion", but he didn't.I bought this set because I wanted something I liked but also was not too "girly" for my husband. This also came with shams, a pillow and sheets, so it seemed to meet all my criteria.PROS:- Very soft comforter. Keeps us warm but not to where we are sweating.- Sheets are decent as far a softness goes.- I ordered a size up and the comforter fits great.- Price- Arrived quickCONS:- We ordered a California king for our king size bed. The comforter fits great (a king would've been way too small). However, the sheets do NOT fit. Even ordering a size up, they do not cover our 10" mattress.- The sheets came with a hole in them. Kind of a waste to order this set because it came with sheets... if the sheets have a hole.- the shams are not "sham material" but are actually pillow cases. They still work but not what I expected.- The black pillow is small and flat. I wish there had been a zipper so I could put another pillow in there but not a huge deal for me.You get what you pay for. All in all it's really not bad. I would have given it another star if the sheets weren't ripped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful bed set
reviews.reviewText: super Happy with this bedding set. It's super soft and feels great quality for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, washes great!
reviews.reviewText: We love that there are two different side! The shots are soft along with the sheets! Pillow case are a little big for our pillow but we love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not wide enough
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful colors. Very soft. Not very thick. It fits great length wise on our king bed, however it does not fit width wise, leaving alot of the mattress itself and the fitted sheet showing. The fitted sheet and too sheet are both plenty big enand look great. The pockets on the fitted sheet where a nice surprise. The pillow cases the go with the sheets as well as the ones that go with the comforter are HUGE. You could easily put two pillows in one pillow case. We will definitely keep the sheets. We will now unfortunately have to look for a new comforter that fits properly. If you like this one make sure to size up when you order just so it's wide enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price. Comes with sheet set, 4 pillow cases and a small pillow. Comforter is cozy & warm but lightweight feeling. Would recommend.
